div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die
Septembris Anno quosupra

The saide day the aldirman balyeis consale and diuers' of
consale and communite present for the tyme grantit and Sett
to Jonhne mvnk the pece of land' of the communite
one the northt part of the Sekfolkis hous' quhilk thai
occupeit obefor for ix yeris hereftir for demi mark of
maile yerlie and ordanit ane assedacion to be maid'
to him tharapone vndir the common Sele

The said day It was deliuerit be ane assis' that Androw
litstar in the grene and James Kennarty yongar sal resaue fra
barrellis malcum Crage iij barrelis of ays' of Robert andirsonez
and pay him tharfor as he bocht tham and pait for wthir
thre barrellis bocht and resauit fra him and one Siklik parte

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
Septembris Anno quo supra

The saide day Agnes Culan malysone the relict of
murthow glenmaluyng grantit his avand' to george eduard
sone burges of Edinburghe ane barrele of Salmond'
sufficient merchand' gude to be pait betuix this and lammes
next to Cum

the saide day Alexander sanchar' grantit and oblist him to keipe
Jonhne Dauisone Skippar of the quenys fery skathles
of four' vnicornis of gold'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die Septembris
anno quosupra

The saide day thomas Jamesone seriand' at commavnd' of the ba the aldirman
and balyeis chargit James Kintor' be his wand' to reman
within the tolbutht quhile he pait ane barrel of Salmond' to thome
menyeis eftir the tenor of the akis maid' obefore and the saide seriand'
in likuys' at commavnd' of the Aldirman and balyeis chargit thome
of fyf to remane within the tolbutht quhile he freid' James of
Kintor of demi barrel of Salmond'

Eodem die Alexander rede prepositus Inuenit thomam mar plegium
legalem quod thomas fyf et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro
eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et dictus thomas fyf
Inuenit Andream ancroft plegium legalem quod dictus Alexander
rede et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter
quam per viam iuris et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur per ostensionem manuum
ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die Andreas Kennarty Inuenit Jacobus Kennarty seniorem
plegium legalem quod thomas glenmaluyn erit Indempnes pro se
et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et Idem thomas Inuenit
thomam narne plegium legalem quod dictus Andreas erit Indempnis
pro se et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Jacobus Kennarty senior Inuenit
Johannem gilespy plegium legalem quod thomas glenmaluyn erit Indempnes
pro se et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et Idem thomas inuenit
Willelmum Cryne plegium legalem quod ipse Jacobus erit Indempnis
pro se et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Alexander talyour Inuenit
Jacobum Kennarty seniorem plegium legalem quod thomas glenmaluyn
erit Indempnis pro se et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et Idem
thomas Inuenit Alexandrum prat plegium legalem quod Idem Alexander
erit Indempnes pro se et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris
Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur per manuum ostensionem ad conseruandum
plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die Alexander talyour deuenit plegius legalis quod thomas
glenmaluyn et Agnes Stratht vxor sua erunt Indempnes pro
se et parte sua tam in verbo quam in opere aliter quos per viam iuris
sub pena quinque marcarum vsualis monete Scocie fabrice ecclesie
beati Nicholaij soluendum Et thomas glenmaluyn deuenit plegius
quod dictus Alexander et vxor sua erunt Indempnes pro se et parte sua
tam in verbo quam in Cor opere aliter quam per viam iuris sub
pena quinque marcarum fabrice dicte ecclesie fideliter Soluend'

The saide day thomas fyf ane of the balyeis of Abirdene was
conuikit be ane Suorne assis' and in ane amerciament of the
Court for Strubulance of Alexander rede aldirman in worde
In the said court Ande the saide Alexander and henry rede his brothir
was fundin quyt of ale Strubulance of the said thomas be
the saide assis' Alexander chavmer eldar forspekar of the samyn

The saide day Androw nachty ane of the sergeandis of Abirdene
producit lauchfullie Jonhne Waus and vthiris diuers' personis
quhilkis Suewir' the gret bodely aithe that thai hed'
lauchfullie prefit ane brone gray govne of Duncane
Stralochis to tuelf Schillingis one thre merkat dais
for pament of x s' to patrik wys'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxvij die Septembris Anno quo supra

The samyn day Jonhne blak was quyt of Strubulance
of Strubulance Jonhne malisone be ane assis' thomas
mar' forspekar that

The saide day Androw lammyntone was conuikit
be ane Suorne assis' for the wranguis' strubu
lance and hurtinge of Androw Dewy vndir cilence
of nicht throw forthocht fellone and was in ane
amerciament of the court and to amend as law wile and
forber' in tyme to Cum And' Atour thai ordanit the
saide Androw to pay ij li' of waxe to Sanct nicho
les licht and haly bludmes'

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas
mar' forspekar that Williame gray sale cum one fryday that nixt
cumis to the tolbuthe and depone the gret aithe that he was nothir
art part nor' causar' of the outtaking of ane harnes' barell
pertening to Duncane tailyour out of the schip callit the nicho
les' and to acquit him of the geir' being within the saide barrell
and gif he deponis the saide athe he is quyt of the saide
Duncanez challange and failyeing tharof to recompens' to the
saide Duncane the skatht done be the saide Williame
Vltimo die mensis Octobris Septembris anno quo supra die apto pro electione officiariorum

Eodem die Consules et communitas congregati exonerarunt et quiete
clamarunt Alexandrum Rede prepositum de taxta recepta per ipsum sibique
potestatem conceden' ad aggregandum et recipiendum restam eiusdem Et Idem
prepositus dictos consules et communitatem de fabrica operis campanilis exoner
auit Igitur ipsum de omnibus burgensibus tempore suo factis quietecla
marunt cum libera potestate vnum burgensem adhuc creare et cetera

The saide day the consale and communite grauntit to pay the xiiij
li' gevin to the kingis propine Ande to mak commissaris and procuratouris
to follow mastir Androw Cadious' summonce and to mak the expens'
and costis tharapone thai beinge Circualie Inquerit be philp
of Dunbrek officiar'

Eodem die patricius leslie deuenit plegius quod Johannes
Waus erit Indempnis pro se Dauid menyeis et parte sua aliter
quam per viam juris Et Richardus Waus deuenit plegius legalis
quod dictus Dauid erit Indempnis pro dicto Johanne et parte sua aliter
quam per viam juris Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum
suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

The samyn day comperit ane worschipful clerk mastir Androw
liale thesaurar' of Abirdene and askit pament diuers' tymes at the
aldirman and balyeis of the covntas' of Cravfurdis pension'
quhilkis he gate nocht nochtwithstandinge he did' his diligence
to the gettyne of It and protestit for Remeid' of law

The samyn day Alexander Red aldirman perofferit his compt to the tone and
thai denyit and refusit to tak his compt vnto the tyme the
tone war' freid' of the malys of this yer' bigan In the
quhilk yer' he buyr' office

xix die Octobris anno quo supra Andreas philpsone fecit
constituit creauit et nominauit Willelmum Walcar' de Drum suum
verum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem in omnibus suis causis actioni
bus et querelis ipsum concernentibus et notant' deficien' vxor
et prolibus suis ad assedandum terram suam in vici viridi
firmas leuand' promitten' de Rato et grato cum omnibus terminis
necessariis et oportunis in vberiore forma procuratorij

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in
pretorio eiusdem xiiijto die mensis Octobris Anno
Domini mullesimo millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo tercio

Eodem die Alexander Rede electus fuit in officium
prepositure pro anno futuro prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die Alexander de Camera filius Andreas Culane senior
Andreas Culane Junior et Dauid mar electi fuerunt in
officium balliuorum prestitis Solitis Juramentis pro anno futuro

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Andreas nachty thomas
Jamesone et Johannes brogane electi fuerunt sergeandi
pro anno futuro prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Dominus Johannes ruthirfurde
Alexander chamer de murchill
Alexander menyeis
Robertus blinsele
Johannes culane
Dauid menyeis
Johannes Colisone
Thomas prat
Johannes Wormet
Johannes menyeis
Andreas branche
Andras murray senior
Dauid mathesone
Walterus Auchneyve
Willelmus blinsele
Willelmus futhes
Robertus crage
